verses.verse: בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> ba-Nim Ye [are] the children אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> 'at-Tem, you לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ <WH1413> tit-go-de-Du, ye shall not cut וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תָשִׂ֧ימוּ <WH7760> ta-Si-mu yourselves nor make קָרְחָ֛ה <WH7144> ka-re-Chah any baldness בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> 'ei-nei-Chem between your eyes לָמֵֽת׃ <WH4191> la-Met. for the dead

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for עַ֤ם <WH5971> 'am people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> ka-do-Vosh For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וּבְךָ֞ u-ve-Cha בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> ba-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot become לוֹ֙ lo לְעַ֣ם <WH5971> le-'Am people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <WH5459> se-gul-Lah, thee to be a peculiar מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ha-'am-Mim, unto himself above all the nations אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [are] upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah. the earth ס sa-Mek
לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> to-Chal Thou shalt not eat כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <WH8441> to-'e-Vah. any abominable thing

זֹ֥את <WH2063> zot likewise הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah These [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu; which ye shall eat שׁ֕וֹר <WH7794> Shor the ox שֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> seh lesser כְשָׂבִ֖ים <WH3775> che-sa-Vim lamb וְשֵׂ֥ה <WH7716> ve-Seh lesser עִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> 'iz-Zim. and the goat

אַיָּ֥ל <WH354> 'ai-Yal The hart וּצְבִ֖י <WH6643> u-tze-Vi and the roebuck וְיַחְמ֑וּר <WH3180> ve-yach-Mur; and the fallow deer וְאַקּ֥וֹ <WH689> ve-'ak-Ko and the wild goat וְדִישֹׁ֖ן <WH1788> ve-di-Shon and the pygarg וּתְא֥וֹ <WH8377> u-te-'O and the wild ox וָזָֽמֶר׃ <WH2169> va-Za-mer. and the chamois

וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol Any בְּהֵמָ֞ה <WH929> be-he-Mah And every beast מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <WH6536> maf-Re-set that parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <WH6541> par-Sah, the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <WH8156> ve-sho-Sa-'at the cleft שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <WH8157> she-sa' and cleaveth שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei into two פְרָס֔וֹת <WH6541> fe-ra-Sot, claws מַעֲלַ֥ת <WH5927> ma-'a-Lat [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> bab-be-he-Mah; among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. that ye shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> 'ach Nevertheless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶ֞ה <WH2088> zeh of these לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo are not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> to-che-Lu Nevertheless these ye shall not eat מִמַּֽעֲלֵ֣י <WH5927> mi-ma-'a-Lei of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <WH1625> hag-ge-Rah, the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֥י <WH6536> u-mi-maf-ri-Sei or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֖ה <WH6541> hap-par-Sah hoof הַשְּׁסוּעָ֑ה <WH8156> hash-she-su-'Ah; the cloven אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַ֠גָּמָל <WH1581> Hag-ga-mol [as] the camel וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַרְנֶ֨בֶת <WH768> ha-'ar-Ne-vet and the hare וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁפָ֜ן <WH8227> hash-sha-Fan and the coney כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַעֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> ma-'a-Leh for they chew גֵרָ֣ה <WH1625> ge-Rah the cud הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, like וּפַרְסָה֙ <WH6541> u-far-Sah not the hoof לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not הִפְרִ֔יסוּ <WH6536> hif-Ri-su, but divide טְמֵאִ֥ים <WH2931> te-me-'Im [therefore] they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem like לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַ֠חֲזִיר <WH2386> Ha-cha-zir And the swine כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because מַפְרִ֨יס <WH6536> maf-Ris because it divideth פַּרְסָ֥ה <WH6541> par-Sah the hoof הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor גֵרָ֔ה <WH1625> ge-Rah, yet cheweth not the cud טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> mib-be-sa-Ram of their flesh לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu, unto you ye shall not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <WH5038> u-ve-niv-la-Tam their dead carcase לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor תִגָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5060> tig-Ga-'u. nor touch ס sa-Mek

אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶה֙ <WH2088> zeh These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu, These ye shall eat מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol of all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֧ל <WH3605> kol anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> se-nap-Pir all that have fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. shall ye eat

וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> ve-Chol anything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- have ל֛וֹ lo סְנַפִּ֥יר <WH5579> se-nap-Pir And whatsoever hath not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <WH7193> ve-kas-Ke-set and scales לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> to-Che-lu; ye may not eat טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem. ס sa-Mek
כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any צִפּ֥וֹר <WH6833> tzip-Por birds טְהֹרָ֖ה <WH2889> te-ho-Rah [Of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. ye shall eat

וְזֶ֕ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תֹאכְל֖וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu But these [are they] of which ye shall not eat מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> me-Hem; like הַנֶּ֥שֶׁר <WH5404> han-Ne-sher the eagle וְהַפֶּ֖רֶס <WH6538> ve-hap-Pe-res and the ossifrage וְהָֽעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <WH5822> ve-Ha-'a-ze-ni-Yah. and the ospray

וְהָרָאָה֙ <WH7201> ve-ha-ra-'Ah And the glede וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָ֣אַיָּ֔ה <WH344> ha-'ai-Yah, and the kite וְהַדַּיָּ֖ה <WH1772> ve-had-dai-Yah and the vulture לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-Nah. after his kind
וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and every עֹרֵ֖ב <WH6158> 'o-Rev And every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-No. after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et בַּ֣ת <WH1323> bat first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <WH3284> hai-ya-'a-Nah, and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <WH8464> hat-tach-Mas and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁ֑חַף <WH7828> hash-Sha-chaf; and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנֵּ֖ץ <WH5322> han-Netz and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4327> le-mi-Ne-hu. after his kind
אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכּ֥וֹס <WH3563> hak-Kos The little owl וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַיַּנְשׁ֖וּף <WH3244> hai-yan-Shuf and the great owl וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <WH8580> ve-hat-tin-Sha-met. and the swan

וְהַקָּאָ֥ת <WH6893> ve-hak-ka-'At And the pelican וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָרָחָ֖מָה <WH7360> ha-ra-Cha-mah and the gier eagle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשָּׁלָֽךְ׃ <WH7994> hash-sha-Lach. and the cormorant

וְהַ֣חֲסִידָ֔ה <WH2624> ve-Ha-cha-si-Dah, And the stork וְהָאֲנָפָ֖ה <WH601> ve-ha-'a-na-Fah and the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <WH4327> le-mi-Nah; after her kind וְהַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <WH1744> ve-had-du-chi-Fat and the lapwing וְהָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <WH5847> ve-ha-'a-tal-Lef. and the bat

וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol and all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <WH8318> She-retz And every creeping thing הָע֔וֹף <WH5775> ha-'of, that flieth טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> ta-Me [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo not יֵאָכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> ye-'a-Che-lu. unto you they shall not be eaten
כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- any ע֥וֹף <WH5775> of fowls טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor [But of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> to-Che-lu. ye may eat

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo shall not תֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> to-che-Lu Ye shall not eat כָל־ <WH3605> chol anything נְ֠בֵלָה <WH5038> Ne-ve-lah [of] any thing that dieth of itself לַגֵּ֨ר <WH1616> lag-Ger it unto the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֜יךָ <WH8179> bish-'a-Rei-cha that [is] in thy gates תִּתְּנֶ֣נָּה <WH5414> tit-te-Nen-nah thou shalt give וַאֲכָלָ֗הּ <WH398> va-'a-cha-Lah, that he may eat א֤וֹ <WH176> o or מָכֹר֙ <WH4376> ma-Chor it or thou mayest sell לְנָכְרִ֔י <WH5237> le-na-che-Ri, it unto an alien כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for עַ֤ם <WH5971> 'am people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> ka-do-Vosh for thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> 'at-Tah, you לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <WH1310> te-vash-Shel Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <WH1423> ge-Di a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <WH2461> ba-cha-Lev milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> im-Mo. in his mother's פ Peh

עַשֵּׂ֣ר <WH6237> 'as-Ser Thou shalt truly תְּעַשֵּׂ֔ר <WH6237> te-'as-Ser, tithe אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <WH8393> te-vu-'At all the increase זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> zar-'E-cha; of thy seed הַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> hai-yo-Tze bringeth forth הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh that the field שָׁנָ֥ה <WH8141> sha-Nah year שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. by year

וְאָכַלְתָּ֞ <WH398> ve-'a-chal-Ta And thou shalt eat לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- he יִבְחַר֮ <WH977> yiv-Char which he shall choose לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name שָׁם֒ <WH8033> sham in it מַעְשַׂ֤ר <WH4643> ma'-Sar there the tithe דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <WH1715> de-ga-ne-Cha of thy corn תִּֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <WH8492> ti-ro-she-Cha of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <WH3323> ve-yitz-ha-Re-cha, and of thine oil וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <WH1062> u-ve-cho-Rot and the firstlings בְּקָרְךָ֖ <WH1241> be-ka-re-Cha of thy herds וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <WH6629> ve-tzo-Ne-cha; and of thy flocks לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so תִּלְמַ֗ד <WH3925> til-Mad, that thou mayest learn לְיִרְאָ֛ה <WH3372> le-yir-'Ah to fear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim.] always

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- for thee so that יִרְבֶּ֨ה <WH7235> yir-Beh be too long מִמְּךָ֜ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha at הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech, And if the way כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki since לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo you are not תוּכַל֮ <WH3201> tu-Chal thou art not able שְׂאֵתוֹ֒ <WH5375> se-'e-To to carry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- when יִרְחַ֤ק <WH7368> yir-Chak be too far מִמְּךָ֙ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha at הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom, it [or] if the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from thee which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> la-Sum to set שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; in it כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki If יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh there when the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְנָתַתָּ֖ה <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Tah Then shalt thou turn בַּכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> bak-Ka-sef; [it] into money וְצַרְתָּ֤ <WH6887> ve-tzar-Ta adversary הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> hak-Ke-sef the money בְּיָ֣דְךָ֔ <WH3027> be-Ya-de-cha, in thine hand וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <WH1980> ve-ha-lach-Ta and shalt go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom, unto the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בּֽוֹ׃ bo.
